abstract String getClassName ()

Detailed Description

A general stack operation.

Gets some arguments from the stack, and replaces them with return values.

Version:
GridRipper 0.5, 11/15/2008
Since:
GROMIT 0.2 (2001)
Author:
Peter Csizmadia
